_header: Who could such a woman counterfeit
Note: Same as stanza 11 of 3618, occurring separately.
_description: In praise of the Virgin Mary — one 8-line stanza

BLAdd36983.First Lines:
Who couthe suche A womman counterffeteThat on all ffolkys hath
                    compassion…
BLAdd36983.Last Lines:
…On Knyght & squyers for theyre renounOn yomen &
                    Gromes for they can stiffly schete
